page.title: 03People on the Farm
page.content: Mr Price lives on the farm with his wife, Mrs Price. They live in the farmhouse, not the " Old House ". They have to get up at 6.30 in the morning. To live on a farm you must like going out in wet weather. They bought the farm because they wanted a bigger one than they had at that time.{ { {What sort of life. They grow their own food mainly. Mr and Mrs Price's life is mostly on the farm.Mrs Price's job is as a school secretary.Mr Price is usualy very busy but he does not show it. { {The work.} Mr Price has to look after the calves and bullocks. He must feed them and change their straw. He must also keep watch for signs of sickness or disease.
